text: Willard Herman Scott, Jr. (March 7, 1934 - September 4, 2021) was an American weather presenter, author, television personality, clown, comedian, radio personality and occasional actor. He was best known for creating and originally playing Ronald McDonald in the McDonald's commercials.Willard Scott, The Joy of Living. New York: Coward, McCann & Geoghegan, 1982 (). He was on The Today Show for many years. He retired in 2015.
